snippet: The Edward M. Kennedy Institute in Boston, opening next month, mirrors the senator’s spirit of cooperation in lawmaking.
abstract: Edward M Kennedy Institute for the United States Senate, set to open in Boston in March, seeks to educate public about workings of Congress; institution includes full-scale replica of Senate chamber featuring software that allows visitors to participate in mock legislative session; institute also aims to mirror late Sen Kennedy's spirit of bipartisan cooperation via historically accurate and nonpartisan exhibits.
lead_paragraph: The Edward M. Kennedy Institute in Boston, opening next month, mirrors the senator’s spirit of cooperation in lawmaking.

headline.seo: Edward M. Kennedy Institute Aims to Teach Collaboration
headline.main: In the Mold of a Senator Who Bartered
headline.print_headline: In the Mold of a Senator Who Bartered
